name: Speedmap Snack Pack 2: Cosmic Hunger
summary: Speedmap jam pack of 19 levels from 21 authors organized into 3 episodes, all made within 48 hours. Mappers could choose from 4 themes (Cr8 base, Egypt, Firetop Mountain, or Knave) with specific weapon progressions. Most maps range from small to medium sized, and can be played from shotgun start if desired.
